name: Keep Killing
description:
It's a back to the rouge type of casual game, kind of like a mowing game, but it doesn't have a cumbersome, complex skill system. Players only need to enhance the basic attributes, the cost is very low.

Game background
In the game, you play as a warrior who finds themselves in hell for some reason. Unfortunately, in hell, you must engage in slaughter to obtain the energy necessary for survival. To stay alive and punish the demons, feel free to unleash your killing spree.

Gameplay Description
In the game, it is essential to ensure that both your health and energy levels do not reach zero. In the first 60 levels, you must kill a fixed number of enemies, allowing you to restore your condition and receive rewards. However, beyond level 60, you will enter a state of relentless slaughter. You can only restore your condition every 30 seconds, while demons will continuously spawn until the player dies.What you need to do is survive as long as you can.
